movie-description: WWF Title (Cage Match): Hulk Hogan vs. King Kong Bundy, WWF Tag Team Titles: Brutus Beefcake & Greg Valentine vs. The British Bulldogs, WWF Intercontinental Title: Randy Savage vs. Brutus Beefcake, WWF Women's Title: The Fabulous Moolah vs. Desiree Peterson, Tito Santana & The Junk Yard Dog vs. The Funk Brothers, Boxing Match: Mr. T. vs Roddy Piper, Flag Match, Cpl. Kirchner vs. Nikolai Volkoff, Paul Orndorff vs. Don Muracco, Jake Roberts vs. George Wells, Adrian Adonis vs. Uncle Elmer, Ricky Steamboat vs. Hercules Hernandez, WWF vs. NFL Battle Royal
